0bec66f803d8cf724b269e0a9700a2249d847b5c.query:
UPDATE balance_vrsc 
        SET balance = balance + $1
        WHERE discord_id IN (SELECT * FROM UNNEST($2::bigint[]))

1a056ef24063992c56c220516e3f34b5c6220990.query: UPDATE balance_vrsc SET balance = balance + $1 WHERE discord_id = $2

26b2ea46ac0f6888c7a051345cc0f4bb2358e926.query: INSERT INTO tips_vrsc(uuid, discord_id, tip_action, amount, counterparty) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5)

2a701d7bee9dd2bcb8e4da41e89dfe4aed4a4c78.query: INSERT INTO transactions_vrsc (uuid, discord_id, transaction_id, opid, transaction_action, fee) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6)

562a0dc83d7614066b62ccfb8633fbfe7df4c0f0.query:
UPDATE balance_vrsc SET balance = CASE
            WHEN discord_id = $1 THEN balance - $3
            WHEN discord_id = $2 THEN balance + $3
        END
        WHERE discord_id IN ($1, $2)

5ab48ee91c6e88927e5447a516dfa143d42dc6db.query: SELECT discord_id, vrsc_address FROM discord_users WHERE discord_id = $1

63def600bdcf738d595bd767cb7d38fb5d7a0f3c.query: UPDATE discord_users SET notifications = ($1) WHERE discord_id = ($2)

a2850f8e9377bc9097817497eb424ecfe09ae0e5.query: SELECT balance FROM balance_vrsc WHERE discord_id = $1

ae24fd00f574049a81c6fd500d8d0c4f9b884073.query: UPDATE balance_vrsc SET balance = balance - $1 WHERE discord_id = $2

bd058a5a7ce91cf460a4c071e2e7b5e75576feee.query: SELECT * FROM transactions_vrsc WHERE transaction_id = $1 AND transaction_action = 'deposit'

d95982d569deedf1e85f9f2f15e2d19a54f9eaa1.query: SELECT notifications FROM discord_users WHERE discord_id = $1

d9ac2fc4a79595f26c1c3795fd0672a66ae49f65.query:
WITH inserted_row AS (
            INSERT INTO discord_users (discord_id, vrsc_address) 
            VALUES ($1, $2)
        )
        INSERT INTO balance_vrsc (discord_id)
        VALUES ($1)

f51ca941dfe1423121100c346c1f7437171635e3.query: INSERT INTO transactions_vrsc (uuid, discord_id, transaction_id, transaction_action) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4)

f6dd740d5e10551558ff29b292c25b1a753d27e7.query: SELECT discord_id FROM discord_users WHERE vrsc_address = $1

f9a1194cceed94a81c1551b46cfe2688c7e59ebb.query: SELECT discord_id, notifications FROM discord_users WHERE discord_id IN (SELECT * FROM UNNEST($1::bigint[]))
